summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4525 for the improvement of the alley in block 5, Gamma Poncin Addition and the alley in block 7, Stander Addition, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 52980, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
